xyz.fsgik.common.base

接口 FsCase

  • 所有已知实现类:
    FsCase.CamelCase, FsCase.SeparatorCase

    public interface FsCase
    Naming case utilities.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  FsCase.CamelCase
      Camel case implementation.
      static class  FsCase.SeparatorCase
      Separator case implementation.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static FsCase LOWER_CAMEL
      Lower camel case.
      static FsCase LOWER_HYPHEN
      Lower hyphen separator case.
      static FsCase LOWER_UNDERSCORE
      Lower underscore separator case.
      static FsCase UPPER_CAMEL
      Upper camel case.
      static FsCase UPPER_HYPHEN
      Upper hyphen separator case.
      static FsCase UPPER_UNDERSCORE
      Upper underscore separator case.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static FsCase camelCase(boolean isUpper)
      Returns camel case (upper or lower) with given upper setting.
      default java.lang.String convert(java.lang.CharSequence chars, FsCase otherCase)
      Converts given chars from this case to other case.
      java.lang.String join(java.util.List<java.lang.CharSequence> words)
      Joins given split words to one String in rules of this case.
      static FsCase separatorCase(java.lang.CharSequence separator, java.lang.Boolean upper)
      Returns separator case with given separator and upper setting.
      java.util.List<java.lang.CharSequence> split(java.lang.CharSequence chars)
      Splits given chars into a word list with rules of this implementation.

    • 字段详细资料

    • 方法详细资料

      • camelCase

        static FsCase camelCase(boolean isUpper)
        Returns camel case (upper or lower) with given upper setting. This implementation uses Character.isUpperCase(char), Character.toUpperCase(char) and Character.toLowerCase(char) to check and convert a char.
        参数:
        isUpper - given upper setting
        返回:
        camel case (upper or lower) with given upper setting

      • separatorCase

        static FsCase separatorCase(java.lang.CharSequence separator,
                            java.lang.Boolean upper)
        Returns separator case with given separator and upper setting. If upper setting is not null, this case will process each split part from split(CharSequence) by upper setting. If upper setting is null, there is no case process for each split part.
        参数:
        separator - given separator
        upper - upper setting
        返回:
        separator case with given separator and upper setting

      • split

        java.util.List<java.lang.CharSequence> split(java.lang.CharSequence chars)
        Splits given chars into a word list with rules of this implementation. Default implementations use FsString.subView(CharSequence, int, int) to build sub-sequence.
        参数:
        chars - given chars
        返回:
        split word list

      • join

        java.lang.String join(java.util.List<java.lang.CharSequence> words)
        Joins given split words to one String in rules of this case. It is assumed that the words is split by split(CharSequence).
        参数:
        words - given split words
        返回:
        joined string

      • convert

        default java.lang.String convert(java.lang.CharSequence chars,
                                 FsCase otherCase)
        Converts given chars from this case to other case. The default implementation is: 
             return otherCase.join(split(chars));
        参数:
        chars - given chars
        otherCase - other case
        返回:
        converted string
        另请参阅:
        split(CharSequence), join(List)
